name: watercoin-deployment
description: Deployment scripts untuk Watercoin AI Monitoring System with HEDERA Integration

scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && echo 'Frontend build completed'
scripts.deploy:server: cd server && npm run build && echo 'Server build completed'
scripts.start:production: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.check:tablet: echo 'Checking Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 compatibility...' && cd frontend && npm run dev
scripts.build:all: npm run deploy:frontend && npm run deploy:server && echo 'All builds completed successfully'
scripts.production:ready: npm run build:all && npm run test:all && echo 'Production ready!'
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.update:all: npm update && cd frontend && npm update && cd ../server && npm update
scripts.audit:all: npm audit && cd frontend && npm audit && cd ../server && npm audit

author: Watercoin Team
